TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

summary.span: 提供 的 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取消刪除作業中的資料列事件處理常式中，設定屬性設`true`。To cancel the deletion of a row in a event handler, set the property to `true`. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個型別。The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中實作虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個型別。The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中實作虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
